description: '''Maretu''' (stylized in all caps), also known as '''Gokuaku-P''' ([[Japanese language|Japanese]]: {{lang|ja|極悪P}}, "EvilP") is a Japanese musician, [[Vocaloid]] producer, and songwriter. He started releasing Vocaloid music in 2011, and the ''[[:ja:リアルサウンド|Real Sound]]'' described him as one of the representative Vocaloid producers since 2017. He has gained a [[cult following]].
